meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Field</kanji> <kanji>Sphere</kanji>! The greatest sport to grace this earth since a very similar (aka the same) sport, <vocabulary>baseball</vocabulary>. Think about it, you play on a field and you use a little sphere. Awesome!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
